csucistats 0.3.5

Package index

All functions

b()
Extract regression coefficients from a linear regression model.
bottom()
Obtain the Bottom X Percents
cat_stats()
Obtain Frequencies and Proportions for a Categorical Variable
descriptive()
Obtain Descriptive Statistics from a data frame.
f()
Extract the F Statistic
install_plots()
Install ggplots and other plotting packages
install_themes()
Install Themes
middle()
Obtain the middle X Percent
new_hw()
Generate a QMD file to create a homework template for class. Files will be saved in it's own folder.
new_hw_open()
Generate a QMD file to create a homework template for class. Files will be saved in it's own folder. This function will automatically open in RStudio.
new_presentation()
Generate a QMD file to create a presentation template for class. Files will be saved in it's own folder.
new_presentation_open()
Generate a QMD file to create a presentation template for class. Files will be saved in it's own folder. This function will automatically open in RStudio.
num_stats()
Obtain Numerical Statistics for a Continuous Variable
r2()
Obtained the R-Squared Value from a Linear Model
reiterate()
Repeat a task numerous times
resample()
Sample a data frame with replacement
shuffle()
Reorder the data of a vector
sse()
Compute the sum of error squared for an R object
top()
Obtain the top X Percent
